channel.title: I need help running my server!
channel.description: i am haveing a problem running my server it wont run. i have a linksys net router and i cant figure out how to like do port forward...it wont let anyone on the server but me whan i use my gateway it wont.

item.title: I need help running my server!
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Hm, I honestly have no idea about linksys, and for lots the Ip won’t usually work, (my friends that is), I typed gateway.2wire.net and it took me to mine(I have a 2wire router), try gateway.linksys.net lol.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help running my server!

item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Lol…People will flame you about that, linksys is the easiest to port forward. Use the DNS server Ip looking thing lol. Type it in your adress bar.
